about_the_game:
LET BLOOD BE SHED!

The world as you knew it is gone, replaced by a twisted and violent hellscape. You've been injected with a psychoactive drug, and your mind and body are barely holding together. Fight your way through the chaos and emerge alive, if you can.

  • KILL OR BE KILLED
    In this brutal fight for survival, there's no room for mercy or hesitation. You'll have to wield every weapon at your disposal and butcher your way through hordes of enemies.

  • DEATH IS INEVITABLE
    Get ready to die - a lot. Every misstep could be your last. But with each death comes the opportunity to learn and improve, inching closer to victory.

  • ARM YOURSELF TO THE TEETH
    From a nail gun to a deadly shotgun, you'll have to gather an arsenal of weapons to face your enemies. Each shot counts, and every weapon could be your last hope.

  • FIGHT TO SURVIVE
    Time is running out, and your body is slowly shutting down. You'll need to rely on your adrenaline and quick reflexes to stay alive.

  • NEED A DOSE?
    Find and use different injections throughout the game to enhance your abilities. Whether you need a health boost or increased agility, these shots might be your only hope.

  • CRAFT YOUR OWN DEATHTRAPS
    Get creative and design your own deadly levels with the custom editor. Add your favorite music and share your creation with the world. The bloodbath doesn't have to end.

LET BLOOD BE SHED!

The world as you knew it is gone, replaced by a twisted and violent hellscape. You've been injected with a psychoactive drug, and your mind and body are barely holding together. Fight your way through the chaos and emerge alive, if you can.

  • KILL OR BE KILLED
    In this brutal fight for survival, there's no room for mercy or hesitation. You'll have to wield every weapon at your disposal and butcher your way through hordes of enemies.

  • DEATH IS INEVITABLE
    Get ready to die - a lot. Every misstep could be your last. But with each death comes the opportunity to learn and improve, inching closer to victory.

  • ARM YOURSELF TO THE TEETH
    From a nail gun to a deadly shotgun, you'll have to gather an arsenal of weapons to face your enemies. Each shot counts, and every weapon could be your last hope.

  • FIGHT TO SURVIVE
    Time is running out, and your body is slowly shutting down. You'll need to rely on your adrenaline and quick reflexes to stay alive.

  • NEED A DOSE?
    Find and use different injections throughout the game to enhance your abilities. Whether you need a health boost or increased agility, these shots might be your only hope.

  • CRAFT YOUR OWN DEATHTRAPS
    Get creative and design your own deadly levels with the custom editor. Add your favorite music and share your creation with the world. The bloodbath doesn't have to end.
name: INJECTION

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or greater
  • Processor: Intel Core I3 2nd generation or better
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU with at least 1GB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or greater
  • Processor: Intel Core I5 2nd generation or better
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU with at least 1GB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

dejus.descriptors:
Linguagem imprópria
Drogas lícitas
Violência fantasiosa

short_description: A dynamic platformer with lots of blood and chaotic shooting. Unleash your desire for violence by killing crowds of enemies, hastily injecting yourself with another dose of experimental drug.
supported_languages: English, Russian, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Polish
